project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Develop a quiz game in Python that asks multiple-choice questions, keeps track of the user's score, and displays it at the end.

task.name: Define quiz questions and answers in a variable
Implement the function to present questions and gather user responses
Implement score tracking based on user responses
Implement a function to display the final score
Write tests to ensure each function operates correctly
Execute tests on all implemented functions to ensure overall functionality
